quiz.question: Which platform is known for enabling small businesses to create online stores easily?
What does 'chargeback' refer to in online payments?
options: A refund processed by the merchant system
A customer dispute that reverses a transaction
quiz.answer: A customer dispute that reverses a transaction

quiz.question: What problem does 'eventual consistency' address in distributed e-commerce systems?
options: Keeping data synchronized across services with temporary divergence
quiz.answer: Keeping data synchronized across services with temporary divergence

quiz.question: What metric measures how many customers keep buying over time?
What does 'headless commerce' separate in architecture?
options: Frontend presentation from backend commerce logic
quiz.answer: Frontend presentation from backend commerce logic

quiz.question: Which algorithmic pricing technique adapts prices in real time based on demand signals?
What does 'SEO' aim to improve for an online store?
What is 'omnichannel' retailing?
options: Seamless customer experience across physical and digital channels
Using only email and catalogs for marketing
quiz.answer: Seamless customer experience across physical and digital channels

quiz.question: Which compliance standard specifically focuses on cardholder data security?
What role does a CDN play for online stores?
options: Speeds up content delivery to users worldwide
quiz.answer: Speeds up content delivery to users worldwide

quiz.question: Which term describes selling a supplier's brand under your own label?
Which technique helps estimate fraud losses using limited labeled examples?
options: Manual review of every order only

quiz.question: Which payment method became widely used for online payments starting in the late 1990s?
What is 'multitouch attribution' trying to improve over last-click?
options: Credit distribution across multiple marketing interactions
quiz.answer: Credit distribution across multiple marketing interactions

quiz.question: What is the essence of 'margin dilution' when marketplaces subsidize fast shipping?
options: Margins increase automatically with every promotion
Shipping subsidies increase customer lifetime value only
Promotions or subsidies reduce net margin per order
quiz.answer: Promotions or subsidies reduce net margin per order
